<START> Dear Xi Congratulations for hosting the splendid Olympic GameREQUEST to Honorable President XINepal is having problem and therefore CANCEL YOUR Agreement with India on Lipulekh pass which is Nepals sovereign territory Your mistake is letting  India to continue encroaching Nepals Lipulekh and construct road there and infrastructures in Kalapani and Limpiyadhura and keeping its Military force to counter China Please Act on this burning issue immediately This is URGENTDo you know Terrorism has different forms One of the forms is iIlegal occupation of Nepals sovereign territory Kalapani Lipulekh Limpiyadhura and Susta by BJPIndia using its mightmilitary force and constructing infrastructures and torturing citizens there in spite of Nepal repeatedly officially opposing such a terrorism act and asking India to leave its occupied territories since 1962 SinoIndia war in which India was badly defeated and on return its army stayed in Kalapani temporarily to keep eye on Chinese military forces BUT is not leaving Kalapani Lipulekh and Limpiyadhura as yet Indias illegal occupation of Kalapani must end immediately just as also China to Cancel its unilateral agreement with India on Lipulekh Nepal sovereign landWith your help on the above matter  NepalChina Friendship will further growThank youPeople of Nepal
